summary: Adds a small Orc hut on a secluded cliff in the mountains within the Reach.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Arial][size=2][b][i][color=#f4f4f4]"My time has come. I am old. Too old to become chief. It would be wrong for me to take wives at this age. So I will die. Malacath has given me a vision of a glorious death." -Previous owner of the hut before setting out to seek a good death.[/color][/i][/b]
[/size][/font]
[url=http://s1279.photobucket.com/user/Jack_Amaturo/media/2014-09-29_00011_zps7bfaa590.jpg.html][img]http://i1279.photobucket.com/albums/y528/Jack_Amaturo/2014-09-29_00011_zps7bfaa590.jpg[/img][/url]

Long description

Adds a small Orc hut within the Reach's mountainous area. It has a wonderful view at night as well as during the day. To gain access to the Hut you'll need to get the key that's at the little Malacath shrine. It'll be right above the Sword. Everything inside is 100% safe ... But will it blend?

(I've always felt there weren't enough ORKY homes in Skyrim! So I made this!)


























And remember ....Â [i][b]We'z Orkz da best. Think diffrent do ya?

[url=http://s1279.photobucket.com/user/Jack_Amaturo/media/warhammer40k_5_zps04c56d0b.jpg.html][img]http://i1279.photobucket.com/albums/y528/Jack_Amaturo/warhammer40k_5_zps04c56d0b.jpg[/img][/url]
Come and have a go then, ya runty little wimp![/b][/i]
author: BillNyeTheScienceGuy
